item.description:
Celebrate the Winter Solstice and take a break from holiday shopping, baking, visiting, partying and madness. De-stress with a nice evening walk with friends.

Walk with us through the quiet neighborhoods of Needham while admiring all the pretty holiday lights. We will meet at the Needham Center Train Station parking lot at 5:00 PM and walk for about 2 hours. The parking lot has ample free evening parking.

If there is interest, we can have dinner, or hot toddies, afterward at Not Your Average Joe's in Needham Center. Let me know in your RSVP so that I can make arrangements.

My cell number is 781-956-2099 if you need to reach me before the walk. I live in a cell dead zone, so you can also try my home number 781-237-6719.

Heavy rain or snow cancels.
item.name: Needham Holiday Lights Stroll
